title: IVR-Based Waste Management Simulation Training for Climate Change Response

context.prior_knowledge: Basic principles of climate change and foundational awareness of environmental issues
context.additional_context: Modular learning via mobile devices in a BYOD environment, combining weekly 2-hour offline sessions with self-directed online learning

learning_goals: Acquire expert knowledge of waste classification and disposal procedures via IVR simulation (achieve over 90% accuracy).
Enhance pro-environmental intentions by 25% based on virtual environment experiences.
30% increase in self-efficacy and response efficacy assessment scores after simulation performance
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
